unit.doc: Type-safe access to the XML formats. See: http://0install.net/interface-spec.html http://0install.net/selections-spec.htmlInternally, all _ t types are just Support.Qdom.element, but we add a phantom type parameter to avoid mix-ups. e.g. a [`command] t is an element that we know is a <command>.The type parameter is a polymorphic variant because many commands work on multiple element types. For example, many elements have an 'interface' attribute, so the interface function accepts multiple types.

value.doc: Find the <runner> child of this element (selection or command), if any.Safe_exceptionif there are multiple runners.
Copy element with a new interface. Used to make relative paths absolute.
raise_elem "Problem with" elem raises a Safe_exception with the message "Problem with <element> at ..."
Like raise_elem, but writing a log record rather than raising an exception.
Generate a string identifying this element for use in error messages. Includes the source location, if known.
